alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Humphreys; Lawrence; Lewis; Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 12:43AM CDT until August 10 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Perry County in Middle Tennessee... South central Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1243 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Parsons to near Savannah, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Hohenwald, Centerville, Waynesboro, Linden, Collinwood, Summertown, Clifton, Lobelville, Ethridge, Gordonsburg, Kimmins, Henryville, Busseltown, Primm Springs, Flatwoods, Lyles, Mousetail Landing State Park, Pleasantville and Nunnelly. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 147 and 149. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Hickman; Humphreys; Lawrence; Lewis; Perry; Wayne
